packageName: Hubitat → Xbar App for the Apple  macOS™ Menubar
author: Kurt Sanders
releaseNotes:
After this HPM upgrade, you must manually upgrade the Xbar plugin 'Hubitat_XBar.5m.py' to this same 1.0.4 release in the Xbar plugin directory. Please follow the install instructions in the documentation.

This release has the following improvements:

• Fixed HTTP 404 issue with removing the \ before the ?
